info.title: digitalassets.api
info.description: 2024-05-27 Added attribute descriptionShort to Search endpoint

delete.description: ### General To publish digital assets, create a validation order with an uploaded asset which then can be shared with buyers. ### Endpoint details Delete an uploaded image by using the assetId returned in upload request. - Only assets with status ‘Waiting for QA’ can be deleted. ### Request endpoint for integration DEL https://services.validoo.se/digitalassets.api/AssetsApi/{assetId}

post.description: ### General To publish digital assets, create a validation order with an uploaded asset which later can be shared with buyers. ### Endpoint details Upload a digital asset. - Upload an asset as a QA order. The asset will either be approved (OK) or rejected (NOK), this is a manual process and nothing that can be tracked via Upload API. If an image is rejected customer should monitor the image status in the interface. - If autopublication is set to true, the asset will automatically be published as soon as the image is OK and public date is reached. Addressed trade items will be accessible prior to public access date. - If newDesign is set to true, the asset will not be shared with or accessible to anyone until the assets’ public access date is reached. - If attribute assetPublicAccessDate is excluded from request, current date is automatically set for the asset. - After QA has been performed, always request the image via 'GetAssets' to replace your original, image metadata has been updated for easier image handling. - Accepted fileformat is LZW compressed tiff, jpeg, png, eps, psd, psb and zip. - The filename should be according to the GDSN standard with asset properties defined. The available properties are listed below. Marketing images should include the file extension in the file name. Planogram images should make use of the planogram view indicator instead of file extension. See image specification as pdf [here](https://www.gs1.org/sites/default/files/docs/gdsn/Product_Image_Specification.pdf). - At least one side of the asset is required to be minimum length of 2400px. - Only “ecommerce” tag exists today. - If a zip-file is chosen as upload format, make sure the parameters are identical for all assets within the zip. ### Request endpoint for integration POST https://services.validoo.se/digitalassets.api/AssetsApi

### General Request images for a trade item. Search with GTIN or other trade item attributes to get requested assets. Default main image for a trade item can also be retrieved. Please note that information retrieved from the 'GetAssets' endpoints must be stored locally. The customer product must not depend on direct integration with any 'GetAssets' endpoints. ### Endpoint details Search digital assets by trade item. - The least required parameters in request body is gtin, informationProviderGln and targetMarketCountryCode. - The asset is returned as a base64 string in the output parameter Blob. The string needs to be converted to an image. *Note: Planogram images do not have angleIdentifier, imageType, state or tags metadata.* ### Request endpoint for integration POST https://services.validoo.se/digitalassets.api/AssetsApi/digitalAssetsByItem

get.description: ### General Request images for a trade item. Search with GTIN or other trade item attributes to get requested assets. Default main image for a trade item can also be retrieved. Please note that information retrieved from the 'GetAssets' endpoints must be stored locally. The customer product must not depend on direct integration with any 'GetAssets' endpoints. ### Endpoint details Get digital asset by internal id which is returned via the Search endpoint. The asset is returned as a base64 string in the output parameter blob and needs to be converted to an image. *Note: Planogram images do not have angleIdentifier, imageType, state or tags metadata.* ### Request endpoint for integration GET https://services.validoo.se/digitalassets.api/AssetsApi/digitalAssets

parameters.name: imageResolution
parameters.description: Format - int32. If not set, original resolution will be used

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. If not set, original size will be used

get.description: ### General Request images for a trade item. Search with GTIN or other trade item attributes to get requested assets. Default main image for a trade item can also be retrieved. Please note that information retrieved from the 'GetAssets' endpoints must be stored locally. The customer product must not depend on direct integration with any 'GetAssets' endpoints. ### Endpoint details Get the main image for the item. This is the image visible in the product overview in Validoo. The main image is selected based on the following order: 1. Marketing image, Facing Front, Angle Left 2. Marketing image, Facing Front, Angle Center 3. Marketing image, Facing Front, Angle Right 4. Marketing image, Facing Front, Angle No Plunge 5. Marketing image, other facings 6. Planogram image, Facing Front 7. Planogram image, Facing Top 8. Planogram image, other facings The asset is returned as a base64 string in the output parameter Blob. The string needs to be converted to an image. *Note: Planogram images do not have angleIdentifier, imageType, state or tags metadata.* ### Request endpoint for integration GET https://services.validoo.se/digitalassets.api/AssetsApi/mainImageForItem

parameters.name: imageResolution
parameters.description: Format - int32. If not set, original resolution will be used

parameters.name: imageSize
parameters.description: Format - int32. If not set, original size will be used

post.description: ### General Request images for a trade item. Search with GTIN or other trade item attributes to get requested assets. Default main image for a trade item can also be retrieved. Please note that information retrieved from the 'GetAssets' endpoints must be stored locally. The customer product must not depend on direct integration with any 'GetAssets' endpoints. ### Endpoint details Search for digital assets. - Depending on input parameters Search can return a list and these will be iteratively returned. - If limit is not set, there is a default limit set. - Parameters itemType, assetCategory, fieldOfApplication, angleIdentifier, facingIndicator, imageType, state and tags are enumerations listed below. *Note: Planogram images do not have angleIdentifier, imageType, state or tags metadata.* ### Request endpoint for integration POST https://services.validoo.se/digitalassets.api/AssetsApi/search

FileName.description: The filename should be according to the GDSN standard with asset properties defined. Marketing images should include the file extension in the file name. Planogram images should make use of the planogram view indicator instead of file extension. Read more in Endpoint details.

TargetMarketCountryCode.description: Target market country code, taken from [T3783 code list](https://gs1.se/en/guides/documentation/code-lists/t3783-target-market-country-code/)

Asset.description: The asset as a base64 string

AssetPublicAccessDate.description: If empty or excluded, current date is automatically set.

Validoo.DigitalAssets.Api.Models.AssetUp.description: The only one available today, image with TII

FunctionalName.description: The category to which the product belongs.

DescriptionShort.description: A free form short length description of the trade item that can be used to identify the trade item at point of sale.
